remarks: Dataset contains the top 10 source markets for tourist arrivals in 2020, showing the country, number of arrivals, and market share percentage. Columns: Country, Arrivals, and Share. India leads with 89,357 arrivals (17.6% share), followed by United Kingdom (55,455 arrivals, 10.9% share) and Russian Federation (49,397 arrivals, 9.7% share). The top 10 markets account for approximately 68.2% of total arrivals.
